column10: Cars routinely go flying down flint hill road in both directions at 35+ mph and the crosswalk in front of the school is not enough of bump to slow them down.   There are no safe ways for a young child or family with children to cross flint hill road really because as already noted the intersection with vale is also dangerous.
column21: There is a poorly constructed sidewalk largely only on one side of flint hill road and none for part of the road.
